trans-unit.source: This converter applies only if the path is an admin path, the entity is a config entity, and the "with_config_overrides" element is not set to TRUE on the parameter definition.
trans-unit.target: 只有当路径是admin路径,实体是config实体,并且参数定义中的 "with_config_overrides "元素没有设置为 "TRUE "时,这个转换器才适用。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the return value of TableMappingInterface::getAllColumns() except that this variable is additionally keyed by table name.
trans-unit.target: 这与TableMappingInterface :: getAllColumns（）的返回值相对应，只是此变量另外由表名键入。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the return value of TableMappingInterface::getColumnNames() except that this variable is additionally keyed by field name.
trans-unit.target: 这对应于TableMappingInterface :: getColumnNames（）的返回值，除了此变量还由字段名称键入。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the return value of TableMappingInterface::getExtraColumns() except that this variable is additionally keyed by table name.
trans-unit.target: 这与TableMappingInterface :: getExtraColumns（）的返回值相对应，只是此变量另外由表名键入。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the return value of TableMappingInterface::getFieldNames() except that this variable is additionally keyed by table name.
trans-unit.target: 这对应于TableMappingInterface :: getFieldNames（）的返回值，除了此变量另外由表名键入。

trans-unit.source: This could be for example used on exception pages.
trans-unit.target: 例如,这可以用于异常页面。

trans-unit.source: This data is derived from static::$storageDefinitions, but is stored separately to avoid repeated processing.
trans-unit.target: 该数据来源于static::$storageDefinitions,但为了避免重复处理,单独存储。

trans-unit.source: This data is derived from static::$storageDefinitions, static::$fieldNames, and static::$extraColumns, but is stored separately to avoid repeated processing.
trans-unit.target: 这些数据来源于static::$storageDefinitions、static::$fieldNames和static::$extraColumns,但为了避免重复处理,这些数据被单独存储。

trans-unit.source: This data may be useful for more precise cache invalidation (especially on the client side) and concurrent editing locking.
trans-unit.target: 这些数据可能对更精确的缓存无效(特别是在客户端)和并发编辑锁定有用。

trans-unit.source: This defines how the field data is accessed from the entity. For example, if the field name is "foo", then $entity->foo returns its data.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了如何从实体访问字段数据。例如，如果字段名称为“ foo”，则$ entity-> foo返回其数据。

trans-unit.source: This detects button controls that trigger a form submission by being clicked and having the click processed by the browser rather than being captured by JavaScript. Essentially, it detects if the button's name and value are part of the POST data, but with extra code to deal with the convoluted way in which browsers submit data for image button clicks.
trans-unit.target: 它检测通过点击触发表单提交的按钮控件,并由浏览器处理点击,而不是由JavaScript捕获。本质上,它检测按钮的名称和值是否是POST数据的一部分,但有额外的代码来处理浏览器提交图像按钮点击数据的复杂方式。

trans-unit.source: This detects button or non-button controls that trigger a form submission via Ajax or some other scriptable environment. These environments can set the special input key '_triggering_element_name' to identify the triggering element. If the name alone doesn't identify the element uniquely, the input key '_triggering_element_value' may also be set to require a match on element value. An example where this is needed is if there are several // buttons all named 'op', and only differing in their value.
trans-unit.target: 它检测通过Ajax或其他可脚本环境触发表单提交的按钮或非按钮控件。这些环境可以设置特殊的输入键'_triggering_element_name'来识别触发元素。如果仅仅是名称不能唯一地识别元素,也可以设置输入键'_triggering_element_value'来要求元素值的匹配。一个需要这样做的例子是,如果有几个//按钮都被命名为'op',只是它们的值不同。

trans-unit.source: This differs from $_SERVER['REQUEST_TIME'], which is stored as a float since PHP 5.4.0. Float timestamps confuse most PHP functions (including date_create()).
trans-unit.target: 这与$ _SERVER ['REQUEST_TIME']不同，后者从PHP 5.4.0开始以浮点形式存储。浮动时间戳会混淆大多数PHP函数（包括date_create（））。

trans-unit.source: This dispatch function hands off the passed-in variables to type-specific $theme_TYPE_alter() implementations in the active theme. It ensures a consistent interface for all altering operations.
trans-unit.target: 这个派发函数将传入的变量交给活动主题中特定类型的$theme_TYPE_alter()实现。它确保了所有修改操作的一致接口。

trans-unit.source: This dispatch function hands off the passed-in variables to type-specific hook_TYPE_alter() implementations in modules. It ensures a consistent interface for all altering operations.
trans-unit.target: 这个派发函数将传入的变量交给模块中特定类型的hook_TYPE_alter()实现。它确保了所有改变操作的一致接口。

trans-unit.source: This does not detect button clicks processed by Ajax (that is done in self::elementTriggeredScriptedSubmission()) and it does not detect form submissions from Internet Explorer in response to an ENTER key pressed in a textfield (self::doBuildForm() has extra code for that).
trans-unit.target: 它不检测由Ajax处理的按钮点击(那是在self::elementTriggeredScriptedSubmission()中完成的),也不检测来自Internet Explorer的表单提交,以响应在文本字段中按下的ENTER键(self::doBuildForm()有额外的代码)。

trans-unit.source: This does not render an actual form element, but always returns the value of the default language. It is then extended by Language module via language_element_info_alter() to provide a proper language selector.
trans-unit.target: 这不会呈现实际的表单元素，但始终返回默认语言的值。然后由语言模块通过language_element_info_alter（）对其进行扩展，以提供适当的语言选择器。

trans-unit.source: This does not use a batch, since installing themes is faster than modules and because an installation profile typically installs 1-3 themes only (default theme, base theme, admin theme).
trans-unit.target: 这不使用批处理,因为安装主题比模块快,而且一个安装配置文件一般只安装1-3个主题(默认主题、基本主题、管理主题)。

trans-unit.source: This enables generic rendering of the field with widgets / formatters, including automated support for "In place editing", and with optional configurability in the "Manage display" / "Manage form display" UI screens.
trans-unit.target: 这使得该字段可以通过widgets/formatters进行通用渲染,包括自动支持 "就地编辑",以及在 "管理显示"/"管理表单显示 "UI屏幕中的可选配置。

trans-unit.source: This encapsulates logic related to generating placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 这封装了与生成占位符相关的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper cascading of styles so themes can easily override module styles through CSS selectors.
trans-unit.target: 这确保了风格的正确级联,因此主题可以轻松地通过CSS选择器覆盖模块风格。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to add to the list of configuration collections retrieved by \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigManager::getConfigCollectionInfo(). The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigCollectionInfo instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块添加到\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigManager :: getConfigCollectionInfo（）检索的配置集合列表中。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigCollectionInfo实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to perform additional actions when configuration is imported. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigImporterEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在导入配置时执行其他操作。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigImporterEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to perform additional validation operations when configuration is being imported. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigImporterEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在导入配置时执行其他验证操作。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigImporterEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to perform an action whenever a configuration object is deleted. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigCrudEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在删除配置对象时执行操作。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigCrudEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to perform an action whenever a configuration object is saved. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigCrudEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在保存配置对象时执行操作。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigCrudEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to perform an action whenever a configuration object's name is changed. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Config\ConfigRenameEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在更改配置对象名称时执行操作。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Config \ ConfigRenameEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to react to a new entity type being created. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块对正在创建的新实体类型做出反应。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Entity \ EntityTypeEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to react whenever an existing entity type is deleted. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在删除现有实体类型时作出反应。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Entity \ EntityTypeEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows modules to react whenever an existing entity type is updated. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件允许模块在更新现有实体类型时做出反应。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Entity \ EntityTypeEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to respond anytime a field storage definition is deleted. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Field\FieldStorageDefinitionEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件使您可以在删除字段存储定义的任何时间做出响应。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Field \ FieldStorageDefinitionEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to respond anytime a field storage definition is updated. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Field\FieldStorageDefinitionEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件使您可以在字段存储定义更新时做出响应。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Field \ FieldStorageDefinitionEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to respond to the creation of a new field storage definition. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Field\FieldStorageDefinitionEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件使您可以响应新字段存储定义的创建。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Field \ FieldStorageDefinitionEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to select a different page display variant to use when rendering a page. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Render\PageDisplayVariantSelectionEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件使您可以选择在呈现页面时要使用的其他页面显示变体。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Render \ PageDisplayVariantSelectionEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event gives modules the opportunity to perform some action after route building has completed. The event listener receives a \Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件使模块有机会在路线构建完成后执行某些操作。事件侦听器收到一个\ Symfony \ Component \ EventDispatcher \ Event实例。

trans-unit.source: This event is used to add new routes based upon existing routes, giving modules the opportunity to dynamically generate additional routes. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Routing\RouteBuildEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于基于现有路由添加新路由，从而使模块有机会动态生成其他路由。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Routing \ RouteBuildEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event is used to process new routes before they get saved, giving modules the opportunity to alter routes provided by any other module. The event listener method receives a \Drupal\Core\Routing\RouteBuildEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于在保存新路由之前对其进行处理，从而使模块有机会更改任何其他模块提供的路由。事件侦听器方法接收一个\ Drupal \ Core \ Routing \ RouteBuildEvent实例。

trans-unit.source: This event subscriber wraps all controller executions in a closure that sets up a render context. Consequently, any early rendering will have their bubbleable metadata (assets & cacheability) stored on that render context.
trans-unit.target: 该事件订阅者将所有控制器执行包装在设置渲染上下文的闭包中。因此，任何早期渲染都将在其渲染上下文中存储其可冒泡的元数据（资产和可缓存性）。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown e.g. when trying to have an IN condition with an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 例如,当试图在空数组中使用IN条件时,就会抛出这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown e.g. when trying to insert a row that would violate a unique key constraint.
trans-unit.target: 例如,当试图插入一条违反唯一键约束的记录时,就会产生这个异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception will be thrown when the PDO connection commit() is called. Code should never call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 当PDO连接commit()被调用时,这个异常将被抛出。代码不应该直接调用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: This excludes any lingering simpletest tables generated during test runs.
trans-unit.target: 这排除了测试运行过程中生成的任何滞留的simpletest表。

trans-unit.source: This extends the interface used by the Symfony validator in order to indicate that the Drupal code is actually independent from the Symfony translation component.
trans-unit.target: 这扩展了Symfony验证器使用的接口,以表明Drupal代码实际上是独立于Symfony翻译组件的。

trans-unit.source: This extends the library definitions with the those specified by the libraries-extend specifications for the active theme.
trans-unit.target: 它用活动主题的库扩展规范指定的库定义来扩展库。

trans-unit.source: This fake routing data is needed in order to make batch API work properly.
trans-unit.target: 为了使批处理API正常工作,需要这个假的路由数据。

trans-unit.source: This figures out whether the field is stored in a dedicated or shared table and forwards the call to the proper handler.
trans-unit.target: 它计算出该字段是存储在专用表还是共享表中,并将调用转发到合适的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This file contains functions to perform database updates for a Drupal installation. It is included and used extensively by update.php.
trans-unit.target: 该文件包含用于执行Drupal安装的数据库更新的功能。它由update.php包含并广泛使用。

trans-unit.source: This file does NOT follow Drupal coding standards, so as to simplify future synchronizations.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件并没有遵循Drupal的编码标准,这样可以简化未来的同步。

trans-unit.source: This file will not be renamed as this is a read-only stream wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件不会被重命名,因为这是一个只读的流包装器。

trans-unit.source: This fills in default options for components:
trans-unit.target: 这将填写组件的默认选项。

trans-unit.source: This filter identifies and makes clickable three types of "links".
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器可以识别三种类型的 "链接 "并使其可以点击。

trans-unit.source: This formatter must be available whenever the field type is available (i.e. provided by the field type module, or by a module the field type module depends on).
trans-unit.target: 只要字段类型可用(即由字段类型模块提供,或由字段类型模块所依赖的模块提供),就必须有这个格式器。

trans-unit.source: This function achieves the target aspect ratio by cropping the original image equally on both sides, or equally on the top and bottom. This function is useful to create uniform sized avatars from larger images.
trans-unit.target: 该功能通过对原始图像的两边或上下相等地裁剪来实现目标长宽比。此功能对于用较大的图像创建大小一致的头像非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This function adds a default alt tag to the user_picture field to maintain accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 此函数为user_picture字段添加一个默认的alt标签,以保持可访问性。

trans-unit.source: This function allows you to supply values for form elements and submit a form for processing. Compare to self::getForm(), which also builds and processes a form, but does not allow you to supply values.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数允许你为表单元素提供值,并提交一个表单进行处理。与self::getForm()相比,self::getForm()同样可以构建和处理表单,但不允许你提供值。

trans-unit.source: This function also handles cases where objects are passed as array values.
trans-unit.target: 该函数还可以处理对象作为数组值传递的情况。

trans-unit.source: This function also records the latest change time on the .info.yml files for each module or theme, which is important data which is used when deciding if the available update data should be invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能还记录了每个模块或主题的.info.yml文件的最新变化时间,这是重要的数据,在决定是否应该取消可用的更新数据时使用。

trans-unit.source: This function also resets the theme, which means it is not initialized anymore and all previously added JavaScript and CSS is gone. Normally, this function is called as an end-of-POST-request operation that is followed by a redirect, so this effect is not visible. Since the full reset is the whole point of this function, callers need to take care for backing up all needed variables and properly restoring or re-initializing them on their own. For convenience, this function automatically re-initializes the maintenance theme if it was initialized before.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数也会重置主题,这意味着主题不再初始化,之前添加的所有JavaScript和CSS都会消失。通常情况下,这个函数是作为一个post-request结束的操作被调用的,后面会有一个重定向,所以这个效果是不可见的。由于完全重置是这个函数的全部内容,所以调用者需要注意备份所有需要的变量,并自行正确恢复或重新初始化它们。为了方便起见,如果之前对维护主题进行了初始化,本函数会自动重新初始化。

trans-unit.source: This function assumes all data for the field has already been purged and should only be called by field_purge_batch().
trans-unit.target: 该函数假定该字段的所有数据均已清除，并且只能由field_purge_batch（）调用。

trans-unit.source: This function assumes all fields for the field storage has already been purged, and should only be called by field_purge_batch().
trans-unit.target: 此函数假定已清除字段存储的所有字段，并且只能由field_purge_batch（）调用。

trans-unit.source: This function assumes that the first lines of the specified portions of the two files do not match, and likewise that the last lines do not match. The caller must trim matching lines from the beginning and end of the portions it is going to specify.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数假设两个文件中指定部分的第一行不匹配,同样,最后一行也不匹配。调用者必须从指定部分的开头和结尾修剪匹配的行。

trans-unit.source: This function assumes that the provided URL points to a file archive of some sort. The URL can have any scheme that we have a file stream wrapper to support. The file is downloaded to a local cache.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数假设所提供的URL指向一个文件档案。URL可以是任何我们有文件流包装器支持的方案。该文件被下载到本地缓存中。

trans-unit.source: This function attempts to solve the problem by creating a \DOMDocumentFragment to comment the CDATA tag.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数试图通过创建一个\DOMDocumentFragment来注释CDATA标签来解决问题。

trans-unit.source: This function calls itself recursively to obtain the values for each optgroup within the list of options and when the function encounters an object with an 'options' property inside $element['#options'].
trans-unit.target: 当函数在$element['#options']中遇到一个带有'options'属性的对象时,这个函数会递归调用自己,以获取选项列表中每个optgroup的值。

trans-unit.source: This function can be added as a pre_render callback for a renderable array, usually one which will be themed by links.html.twig. It iterates through all unrendered children of the element, collects any #links properties it finds, merges them into the parent element's #links array, and prevents those children from being rendered separately.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此函数添加为可渲染数组的pre_render回调，通常以links.html.twig为主题。它遍历该元素的所有未呈现子元素，收集其找到的任何#links属性，将它们合并到父元素的#links数组中，并防止这些子元素单独呈现。

trans-unit.source: This function can be called by low-level scripts (such as install.php and update.php) and returns a URL that can be used to attempt to proceed to the next step of the script.
trans-unit.target: 该函数可以由低级脚本（例如install.php和update.php）调用，并返回一个URL，该URL可用于尝试进行脚本的下一步。

trans-unit.source: This function can be called by low-level scripts (such as install.php and update.php) and returns the URL of the current script. Existing query parameters are preserved by default, but new ones can optionally be merged in.
trans-unit.target: 可以由低级脚本（例如install.php和update.php）调用此函数，并返回当前脚本的URL。默认情况下会保留现有查询参数，但可以选择合并新的参数。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used by third-party modules that need to output an isolated field.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能可以被需要输出隔离字段的第三方模块使用。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used to retrieve a schema specification in hook_schema(), so it allows you to derive your tables from existing specifications.
trans-unit.target: 此函数可用于检索hook_schema（）中的架构规范，因此它允许您从现有规范派生表。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used when a module wants to store all submitted form values, for example, by serializing them into a single database column. In such cases, all internal Form API values and all form button elements should not be contained, and this function allows their removal before the module proceeds to storage. Next to button elements, the following internal values are removed by default.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块想要存储所有提交的表单值时,可以使用这个函数,例如,将它们序列化到一个单一的数据库列中。在这种情况下,所有的内部表单API值和所有的表单按钮元素都不应该被包含,这个函数允许在模块继续存储之前删除它们。除了按钮元素之外,以下内部值会被默认删除。

trans-unit.source: This function can replace one permission to several or even delete an old one.
trans-unit.target: 该功能可以将一个权限替换为多个,甚至可以删除一个旧的权限。

trans-unit.source: This function can return FALSE if any of these conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: 如果任何这些条件适用,该函数可以返回FALSE。

trans-unit.source: This function can return definitions both for bundle fields (fields that are not defined in $base_field_definitions, and therefore might not exist on some bundles) as well as bundle-specific overrides of base fields (fields that are defined in $base_field_definitions, and therefore exist for all bundles). However, bundle-specific base field overrides can also be provided by 'base_field_override' configuration entities, and that is the recommended approach except in cases where an entity type needs to provide a bundle-specific base field override that is decoupled from configuration. Note that for most entity types, the bundles themselves are derived from configuration (e.g., 'node' bundles are managed via 'node_type' configuration entities), so decoupling bundle-specific base field overrides from configuration only makes sense for entity types that also decouple their bundles from configuration. In cases where both this function returns a bundle-specific override of a base field and a 'base_field_override' configuration entity exists, the latter takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数既可以返回bundle字段的定义(在$base_field_definitions中没有定义的字段,因此在某些bundle上可能不存在),也可以返回特定于bundle的基字段覆盖(在$base_field_definitions中定义的字段,因此在所有bundle上都存在)。然而,特定于束的基字段覆盖也可以由 "base_field_override "配置实体来提供,这是推荐的方法,除非实体类型需要提供一个与配置无关的特定于束的基字段覆盖。请注意,对于大多数实体类型来说,绑定本身是由配置派生出来的(例如,"节点 "绑定是通过 "node_type "配置实体来管理的),因此,只有对于那些将其绑定与配置解耦的实体类型来说,将绑定特定的基字段覆盖与配置解耦才有意义。在这个函数同时返回一个特定捆绑的基字段覆盖和一个'base_field_override'配置实体存在的情况下,后者优先。

trans-unit.source: This function checks all JavaScript files passed and invokes parsing if they have not yet been parsed for Drupal.t() and Drupal.formatPlural() calls. Also refreshes the JavaScript translation files if necessary, and returns the filepath to the translation file (if any).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数检查所有通过的JavaScript文件,如果它们还没有被解析为Drupal.t()和Drupal.formatPlural()调用,则调用解析。如果需要的话,也会刷新JavaScript翻译文件,并返回翻译文件的文件路径(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: This function converts sub-elements of an element of #type 'table' to be suitable for table.html.twig:
trans-unit.target: 此函数将#type'table '元素的子元素转换为适用于table.html.twig：

trans-unit.source: This function creates a file path that includes a unique containing directory for the file and a file name that is a hash of the virtual file name, a cryptographic secret, and the containing directory mtime. If the file is overridden by an insecure upload script, the directory mtime gets modified, invalidating the file, thus protecting against untrusted code getting executed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数创建了一个文件路径,其中包括文件的唯一包含目录和一个文件名,这个文件名是虚拟文件名、加密秘密和包含目录mtime的哈希值。如果文件被不安全的上传脚本覆盖,目录mtime就会被修改,使文件无效,从而防止不受信任的代码被执行。

trans-unit.source: This function differs from hook_install() in that it gives all other modules a chance to perform actions when a module is installed, whereas hook_install() is only called on the module actually being installed. See \Drupal\Core\Extension\ModuleHandler::install() for a detailed description of the order in which install hooks are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此函数与hook_install（）的不同之处在于，它使所有其他模块都有机会在安装模块时执行操作，而hook_install（）仅在实际安装的模块上调用。有关调用安装挂钩的顺序的详细说明，请参见\ Drupal \ Core \ Extension \ ModuleHandler :: install（）。

trans-unit.source: This function differs from hook_uninstall() in that it gives all other modules a chance to perform actions when a module is uninstalled, whereas hook_uninstall() is only called on the module actually being uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 此函数与hook_uninstall（）的不同之处在于，它为所有其他模块提供了在卸载模块时执行操作的机会，而hook_uninstall（）仅在实际卸载的模块上被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function does not support optgroups (when the elements of the #options array are themselves arrays), and will return FALSE if arrays are found. The caller must either flatten/restore or manually do their manipulations in this case, since returning the index is not sufficient, and supporting this would make the "helper" too complicated and cumbersome to be of any help.
trans-unit.target: 该函数不支持optgroups(当#options数组的元素本身是数组时),如果发现数组,将返回false。在这种情况下,调用者必须进行扁平化/还原或者手动操作,因为返回索引是不够的,而且支持这个函数会使 "助手 "过于复杂和繁琐,没有任何帮助。

trans-unit.source: This function does the inverse of static::fieldSettingsToConfigData(). It's called when loading a field's settings from a configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数与static::fieldSettingsToConfigData()的作用相反。当从配置对象中加载字段的设置时,会调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This function does the inverse of static::storageSettingsToConfigData(). It's called when loading a field's settings from a configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数与 static::storageSettingsToConfigData()相反。当从配置对象中加载字段的设置时,会调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This function does to much magic, so it should be replaced by another services which holds the current active theme information.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能太神奇了,所以应该由另一个服务来代替,它拥有当前活动的主题信息。

trans-unit.source: This function ensures that each passed HTML ID value only exists once on the page. By tracking the already returned ids, this function enables forms, blocks, and other content to be output multiple times on the same page, without breaking (X)HTML validation.
trans-unit.target: 该函数确保每个传递的HTML ID值在页面上只存在一次。通过跟踪已经返回的id,该函数可以使表单、块和其他内容在同一页面上多次输出,而不会破坏(X)HTML验证。

trans-unit.source: This function ensures that the string is pluralized correctly. Since TranslationInterface::translate() is called by this function, make sure not to pass already-localized strings to it. See PluralTranslatableMarkup::createFromTranslatedString() for that.
trans-unit.target: 此函数确保字符串正确地复数。由于此函数调用TranslationInterface :: translate（），因此请确保不要将已经本地化的字符串传递给它。对此，请参见PluralTranslatableMarkup :: createFromTranslatedString（）。

trans-unit.source: This function ensures that the string is pluralized correctly. Since TranslationInterface::translate() is called by this function, make sure not to pass already-localized strings to it. See PluralTranslatableMarkup::createFromTranslatedString() for that.
trans-unit.target: 此函数确保字符串正确地复数。由于此函数调用TranslationInterface :: translate（），因此请确保不要将已经本地化的字符串传递给它。对此，请参见PluralTranslatableMarkup :: createFromTranslatedString（）。

trans-unit.source: This function inserts a wrapper around the region of the form that needs to be refreshed by AJAX, based on information stored in the corresponding submit button form element.
trans-unit.target: 该函数根据存储在相应的提交按钮表单元素中的信息,在需要被AJAX刷新的表单区域周围插入一个包装器。

trans-unit.source: This function is a noop since the configuration cannot be overridden by language unless the Language module is enabled. That replaces the default language manager with a configurable language manager.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是一个noop,因为除非启用语言模块,否则配置不能被语言覆盖。这就用一个可配置的语言管理器代替了默认的语言管理器。

trans-unit.source: This function is a noop since the configuration cannot be overridden by language unless the Language module is enabled. That replaces the default language manager with a configurable language manager. Overrides LanguageManagerInterface::setConfigOverrideLanguage
trans-unit.target: 此功能是noop，因为除非启用了“语言”模块，否则无法用语言覆盖配置。它将默认语言管理器替换为可配置的语言管理器。覆盖LanguageManagerInterface :: setConfigOverrideLanguage

trans-unit.source: This function is a wrapper around the PHP function set_time_limit(). When called, set_time_limit() restarts the timeout counter from zero. In other words, if the timeout is the default 30 seconds, and 25 seconds into script execution a call such as set_time_limit(20) is made, the script will run for a total of 45 seconds before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 此函数是PHP函数set_time_limit（）的包装。调用时，set_time_limit（）从零重新启动超时计数器。换句话说，如果超时是默认的30秒，并且在脚本执行后25秒钟执行了诸如set_time_limit（20）之类的调用，则该脚本将在超时之前运行总计45秒钟。

trans-unit.source: This function is assigned as a #pre_render callback in ::view().
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在::view()中被分配为#pre_render回调。

trans-unit.source: This function is assigned as a #pre_render callback in ::viewMultiple().
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在::viewMultiple()中被分配为#pre_render回调。

trans-unit.source: This function is better than simply calling mt_rand() or any other built-in PHP function because it can return a long string of bytes (compared to < 4 bytes normally from mt_rand()) and uses the best available pseudo-random source.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数比简单地调用mt_rand（）或任何其他内置的PHP函数要好，因为它可以返回一个长字节串（通常与mt_rand（）相比小于4个字节），并使用最佳的伪随机源。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for theme hooks implemented as templates only, not for theme hooks implemented as functions. This preprocess function is the first in the sequence of preprocessing functions that are called when preparing variables for a template.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只对作为模板实现的主题钩子进行调用,不对作为函数实现的主题钩子进行调用。这个预处理函数是为模板准备变量时调用的预处理函数序列中的第一个。

trans-unit.source: This function is called from the system_settings form to check all core file directories (file_public_path, file_private_path, file_temporary_path).
trans-unit.target: 该函数在system_settings表单中被调用,用于检查所有核心文件目录(file_public_path,file_private_path,file_temporary_path)。

trans-unit.source: This function is called on shutdown to ensure that {search_total} is always up to date (even if cron times out or otherwise fails).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在关机时被调用,以确保{search_total}始终是最新的(即使cron超时或失败)。

trans-unit.source: This function is called the first time a new theme is installed. The new theme gets a copy of the default theme's blocks, with the difference that if a particular region isn't available in the new theme, the block is assigned to the new theme's default region.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在第一次安装新主题时被调用。新的主题得到一个默认主题的块的副本,不同的是,如果一个特定的区域在新的主题中不可用,块被分配到新主题的默认区域。

trans-unit.source: This function is called via Ajax when the selected book is changed on a node or book outline form.
trans-unit.target: 当在节点或图书大纲表单上更改所选图书时,通过Ajax调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called when a node listing query is tagged with 'node_access'; when this function returns TRUE, no node access joins are added to the query.
trans-unit.target: 当节点列表查询被标记为'node_access'时,该函数被调用;当该函数返回TRUE时,查询中不添加节点访问连接。

trans-unit.source: This function is equivalent to NestedArray::mergeDeep(), except the input arrays are passed as a single array parameter rather than a variable parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 此函数等效于NestedArray :: mergeDeep（），除了输入数组作为单个数组参数而不是变量参数列表传递。

trans-unit.source: This function is essentially \DOMDocument::normalizeDocument(), but operates on an HTML string instead of a \DOMDocument.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数本质上是 \DOMDocument::normalizeDocument(),但操作的是一个HTML字符串而不是一个 \DOMDocument。

trans-unit.source: This function is for when you want to know the prefix of a table. This is not used in prefixTables due to performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数用于当你想知道一个表的前缀时。由于性能原因,这个函数在prefixTables中没有使用。

trans-unit.source: This function is generally not needed in form submit handlers; Form API takes care of batches that were set during form submission.
trans-unit.target: 在表单提交处理程序中一般不需要这个函数,表单API负责处理表单提交时设置的批次。

trans-unit.source: This function is identical to file_save_data() except the file will not be saved to the {file_managed} table and none of the file_* hooks will be called.
trans-unit.target: 该函数与file_save_data（）相同，除了文件不会保存到{file_managed}表中，并且不会调用任何file_ *挂钩。

trans-unit.source: This function is meant for use by search page plugins, or for building a user interface that lets users clear all or parts of the search index.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是为了搜索页面插件使用的,或者是为了构建一个用户界面,让用户清除全部或部分搜索索引。

trans-unit.source: This function is meant for use by search page plugins, or for building a user interface that lets users mark all or parts of the search index for reindexing.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是为了搜索页面插件使用的,或者是为了建立一个用户界面,让用户标记搜索索引的全部或部分,以便重新索引。

trans-unit.source: This function is meant to be called from PHP snippets, should one wish to embed a view in a node or something. It's meant to provide the simplest solution and doesn't really offer a lot of options, but breaking the function apart is pretty easy, and this provides a worthwhile guide to doing so.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数的目的是为了在PHP代码段中调用,如果你想在节点或其他地方嵌入一个视图。它的目的是提供最简单的解决方案,并没有提供很多选项,但将该函数拆分开来是非常容易的,这提供了一个值得做的指南。

trans-unit.source: This function is rarely necessary.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能很少必要。

trans-unit.source: This function is responsible for invoking hook_verify_update_archive().
trans-unit.target: 该函数负责调用hook_verify_update_archive（）。

trans-unit.source: This function is similar to \Drupal::moduleHandler()->invokeAll(), with the main difference that it does not require that a module be enabled to invoke its hook, only that it be installed. This allows the update system to properly perform updates even on modules that are currently disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此函数类似于\ Drupal :: moduleHandler（）-> invokeAll（），主要区别在于它不需要启用模块来调用其挂钩，而只需安装即可。这样，即使在当前禁用的模块上，更新系统也可以正确执行更新。

trans-unit.source: This function is similar to PHP's array_merge_recursive() function, but it handles non-array values differently. When merging values that are not both arrays, the latter value replaces the former rather than merging with it.
trans-unit.target: 此函数类似于PHP的array_merge_recursive（）函数，但对非数组值的处理方式不同。当合并不是两个数组的值时，后者将替换前者而不是与其合并。

trans-unit.source: This function is the heart of form API. The form gets built, validated and in appropriate cases, submitted and rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是表单API的核心。表单会被构建、验证,并在适当的情况下,被提交和重建。

trans-unit.source: This function is the heart of the update status feature. For each project it is invoked with, it first checks if the project has been flagged with a special status like "unsupported" or "insecure", or if the project node itself has been unpublished. In any of those cases, the project is marked with an error and the next project is considered.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是更新状态功能的核心。对于每一个被调用的项目,它首先检查该项目是否被标记为 "不支持 "或 "不安全 "等特殊状态,或者项目节点本身是否被未发布。在任何一种情况下,该项目都会被标记为错误,并考虑下一个项目。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by \Drupal\Core\Utility\Token::replace() to set up some additional tokens that can be used in email messages generated by user_mail().
trans-unit.target: \ Drupal \ Core \ Utility \ Token :: replace（）使用此功能来设置一些其他令牌，这些令牌可用于user_mail（）生成的电子邮件中。

trans-unit.source: This function is used for recursive loading of stylesheets and returns the stylesheet content with all url() paths corrected.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于递归加载样式表,并返回修正了所有url()路径的样式表内容。

trans-unit.source: This function is used when the script must maintain certain query parameters over multiple page requests in order to work correctly. In such cases (for example, update.php, which requires the 'continue=1' parameter to remain in the URL throughout the update process if there are any requirement warnings that need to be bypassed), using this function to generate the URL for links to the next steps of the script ensures that the links will work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 当脚本必须在多个页面请求上维护某些查询参数才能正常工作时，可以使用此功能。在这种情况下（例如，update.php，如果需要跳过任何要求警告，则需要在整个更新过程中将“ continue = 1”参数保留在URL中），请使用此函数生成用于链接到脚本下一步的操作可确保链接正确运行。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful if you need to modify the options that are already in a form element; for example, to remove choices which are not valid because of additional filters imposed by another module. One example might be altering the choices in a taxonomy selector. To correctly handle the case of a multiple hierarchy taxonomy, #options arrays can now hold an array of objects, instead of a direct mapping of keys to labels, so that multiple choices in the selector can have the same key (and label). This makes it difficult to manipulate directly, which is why this helper function exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要修改表单元素中已有的选项,这个功能就非常有用;例如,删除那些因为其他模块施加的附加过滤器而无效的选项。一个例子是改变分类选择器中的选择。为了正确处理多层次分类法的情况,#options数组现在可以持有一个对象数组,而不是直接将键值映射到标签上,因此选择器中的多个选择可以具有相同的键值(和标签)。这样就很难直接操作了,这也是这个辅助函数存在的原因。

trans-unit.source: This function loads the body part of a partial (X)HTML document and returns a full \DOMDocument object that represents this document.
trans-unit.target: 该函数加载部分(X)HTML文档的主体部分,并返回一个代表该文档的完整的\DOMDocument对象。

trans-unit.source: This function may be used build the data for a menu tree only, for example to further massage the data manually before further processing happens. MenuLinkTree::checkAccess() needs to be invoked afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以只用于建立菜单树的数据,例如在进一步的处理发生之前,进一步手动按摩数据。之后需要调用MenuLinkTree::checkAccess()。

trans-unit.source: This function may be used to grant and revoke multiple permissions at once. For example, when a form exposes checkboxes to configure permissions for a role, the form submit handler may directly pass the submitted values for the checkboxes form element to this function.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以用来同时授予和撤销多个权限。例如,当一个表单暴露出复选框来配置角色的权限时,表单提交处理程序可以直接将复选框表单元素的提交值传递给这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This function must be called for all URIs within user-entered input prior to being output to an HTML attribute value. It is often called as part of \Drupal\Component\Utility\UrlHelper::filterBadProtocol() or \Drupal\Component\Utility\Xss::filter(), but those functions return an HTML-encoded string, so this function can be called independently when the output needs to be a plain-text string for passing to functions that will call Html::escape() separately. The exact behavior depends on the value:
trans-unit.target: 在输出到HTML属性值之前，必须为用户输入的所有URI调用此函数。它通常被称为\ Drupal \ Component \ Utility \ UrlHelper :: filterBadProtocol（）或\ Drupal \ Component \ Utility \ Xss :: filter（）的一部分，但是这些函数返回HTML编码的字符串，因此该函数可以当输出需要为纯文本字符串以传递给将分别调用Html :: escape（）的函数时，将独立调用此方法。确切的行为取决于值：

trans-unit.source: This function performs commands that must run at the beginning of every page request. It throws an exception if the installation should not proceed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数执行必须在每个页面请求开始时运行的命令。如果安装不应该继续,它会抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: This function plays a key role in allowing Drupal's resources (modules and themes) to be located in different places depending on a site's configuration. For example, a module 'foo' may legally be located in any of these three places:
trans-unit.target: 这个功能在允许Drupal的资源(模块和主题)根据网站的配置被放置在不同的地方时起到了关键作用。例如,一个模块 "foo "可以合法地放在这三个地方中的任何一个地方。

trans-unit.source: This function provides suitable alternatives for the following tags: <a> <em> <i> <strong> <b> <br> <p> <blockquote> <ul> <ol> <li> <dl> <dt> <dd> <h1> <h2> <h3> <h4> <h5> <h6> <hr>
trans-unit.target: 此功能为以下标记提供了合适的替代方法：<a> <em> <i> <strong> <b> <br> <p> <blockquote> <ul> <ol> <li> <dl> <dt> < dd> <h1> <h2> <h3> <h4> <h5> <h6> <hr>

trans-unit.source: This function receives a list of requested module updates and determines an appropriate order to run them in such that all update dependencies are met. Any updates whose dependencies cannot be met are included in the returned array but have the key 'allowed' set to FALSE; the calling function should take responsibility for ensuring that these updates are ultimately not performed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数接收一个请求的模块更新列表,并确定一个适当的运行顺序,以便满足所有更新的依赖性。任何不能满足依赖性的更新都会被包含在返回的数组中,但 "allow "键被设置为FALSE;调用函数应该负责确保这些更新最终不会被执行。

trans-unit.source: This function relies on the fact that the .xml release history data comes sorted based on major version and patch level, then finally by release date if there are multiple releases such as betas from the same major.patch version (e.g., 5.x-1.5-beta1, 5.x-1.5-beta2, and 5.x-1.5). Development snapshots for a given major version are always listed last.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能依赖于这样一个事实,即.xml发布历史数据是根据主要版本和补丁级别来排序的,如果有多个版本,例如来自同一个major.patch版本的beta版本(例如5.x-1.5-beta1、5.x-1.5-beta2和5.x-1.5),则最后按发布日期排序。某一主要版本的开发快照总是列在最后。

trans-unit.source: This function renders an element. The top level element is shown with show() before rendering, so it will always be rendered even if hide() had been previously used on it.
trans-unit.target: 此函数呈现一个元素。顶层元素在渲染之前显示为show（），因此即使先前已使用hide（）也会始终渲染该元素。

trans-unit.source: This function replaces values in place if possible, even for multidimensional arrays. This way the old settings do not linger, overridden and also the doxygen on a value remains where it should be.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,这个函数会在原地替换值,即使是多维数组。这样一来,旧的设置就不会残留,不会被覆盖,而且值上的doxygen也会留在它应该在的地方。

trans-unit.source: This function returns an associative array which contains a "directed graph" representation of the dependencies between a provided list of update functions, as well as any outside update functions that they directly depend on but that were not in the provided list. The vertices of the graph represent the update functions themselves, and each edge represents a requirement that the first update function needs to run before the second. For example, consider this graph:
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个关联数组,该数组包含一个 "定向图",表示所提供的更新函数列表之间的依赖关系,以及它们直接依赖但不在所提供列表中的任何外部更新函数。图的顶点代表更新函数本身,每个边代表第一个更新函数需要在第二个更新函数之前运行的要求。例如,考虑这个图。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the contents of the .info.yml file for each installed module or theme.
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回每个安装模块或主题的.info.yml文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: This function sets a refresh flag for a specified language, or all languages except English, if none specified. JavaScript translation files are rebuilt (with locale_update_js_files()) the next time a request is served in that language.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数为指定的语言设置刷新标志,如果没有指定语言,则为除英语以外的所有语言设置刷新标志。当下一次以该语言发送请求时,JavaScript翻译文件将被重建(使用locale_update_js_files())。

trans-unit.source: This function sets up the necessary global variables so that the render system will correctly process #type 'pager' render arrays to output pagers that correspond to the items being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数设置了必要的全局变量,使渲染系统能够正确处理#类型的'pager'渲染数组,以输出与显示项目相对应的pager。

trans-unit.source: This function should alter the URI, if it wants to rewrite the file URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重写文件URL,这个函数应该改变URI。

trans-unit.source: This function should be called when a view is being rendered in a particular location and you want to attach the appropriate contextual links (e.g., links for editing the view) to it.
trans-unit.target: 当一个视图在某个特定的位置被渲染,并且你想把适当的上下文链接(例如,用于编辑视图的链接)附加到它上面时,应该调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This function should be called when modules are added to the system, or when a dynamic system needs to add more theme hooks.
trans-unit.target: 当系统中添加模块时,或者当动态系统需要添加更多主题钩子时,应该调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used in place of calls to realpath() or similar functions when attempting to determine the location of a file. While functions like realpath() may return the location of a read-only file, this method may return a URI or path suitable for writing that is completely separate from the URI used for reading.
trans-unit.target: 尝试确定文件位置时，应使用此函数代替对realpath（）或类似函数的调用。尽管诸如realpath（）之类的函数可以返回只读文件的位置，但是此方法可以返回适合于写入的URI或路径，该路径或路径与用于读取的URI完全分开。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used instead of self::buildForm() when $form_state is not needed (i.e., when initially rendering the form) and is often used as a menu callback.
trans-unit.target: 当不需要$form_state时(即初始渲染表单时),应使用该函数代替self::buildForm(),该函数经常被用作菜单回调。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used when manipulating files that have records stored in the database. This is a powerful function that in many ways performs like an advanced version of copy().
trans-unit.target: 处理具有记录存储在数据库中的文件时，应使用此功能。这是一个功能强大的功能，在许多方面都可以像copy（）的高级版本一样执行。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used when the file to be deleted does not have an entry recorded in the files table.
trans-unit.target: 当要删除的文件在文件表中没有记录时,应使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used whenever you need to load more than one entity from the database. The entities are loaded into memory and will not require database access if loaded again during the same page request.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要从数据库中加载多个实体时,应该使用这个函数。这些实体被加载到内存中,如果在同一页面请求中再次加载,将不需要数据库访问。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used whenever you need to load more than one node from the database. Nodes are loaded into memory and will not require database access if loaded again during the same page request.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要从数据库中加载多个节点时,应该使用这个函数。节点被加载到内存中,如果在同一页面请求中再次加载,将不需要数据库访问。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used whenever you need to load more than one term from the database. Terms are loaded into memory and will not require database access if loaded again during the same page request.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要从数据库中加载多个术语时,应使用此功能。术语被加载到内存中,如果在同一页面请求中再次加载,将不需要数据库访问。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used whenever you need to load more than one user from the database. Users are loaded into memory and will not require database access if loaded again during the same page request.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要从数据库中加载多个用户时,应该使用这个功能。用户被加载到内存中,如果在同一页面请求中再次加载,将不需要数据库访问。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used whenever you need to load more than one vocabulary from the database. Terms are loaded into memory and will not require database access if loaded again during the same page request.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要从数据库中加载一个以上的词汇时,应该使用这个功能。词汇被加载到内存中,如果在同一页面请求中再次加载,将不需要数据库访问。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be used on actual URLs. It should not be used for Drupal menu paths, which can contain arbitrary characters. Valid values per RFC 3986.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该只用于实际的URLs。它不应该用于Drupal菜单路径,因为它可以包含任意的字符。有效值根据RFC 3986。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be used to get the current error level prior to the kernel being booted or before Drupal is installed. In all other situations the following code is preferred:
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该只用于在内核启动之前或者Drupal安装之前获取当前的错误级别。在所有其他情况下,最好使用以下代码。

trans-unit.source: This function should return a URL that can be embedded in a web page and accessed from a browser. For example, the external URL of "youtube://xIpLd0WQKCY" might be "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIpLd0WQKCY".
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该返回一个可以嵌入到网页中的URL,并且可以通过浏览器访问。例如,"youtube://xIpLd0WQKCY "的外部URL可能是 "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIpLd0WQKCY"。

trans-unit.source: This function splits both internal paths like
trans-unit.target: 这个函数把两个内部路径拆开,比如

trans-unit.source: This function takes a form element and adds AJAX behaviors to it such that changing it triggers another part of the form to update automatically. It also adds a submit button to the form that appears next to the triggering element and that duplicates its functionality for users who do not have JavaScript enabled (the button is automatically hidden for users who do have JavaScript).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数接受一个表单元素,并为其添加AJAX行为,这样改变它就会触发表单的另一部分自动更新。它还为表单添加了一个提交按钮,它出现在触发元素的旁边,并且对于没有启用JavaScript的用户来说,它的功能是重复的(对于启用JavaScript的用户来说,按钮会自动隐藏)。

trans-unit.source: This function uses introspection methods provided by the database to create a schema array. This is useful, for example, during update when the old schema is not available.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数使用数据库提供的自省方法来创建一个模式数组。例如,在更新过程中,当旧的模式不可用时,这很有用。

trans-unit.source: This function will not be called for elements with no labels, depending on #title_display. For elements that have an empty #title and are not required, this function will output no label (''). For required elements that have an empty #title, this will output the required marker alone within the label. The label will use the #id to associate the marker with the field that is required. That is especially important for screenreader users to know which field is required.
trans-unit.target: 对于没有标签的元素,这个函数不会被调用,这取决于#title_display。对于#title为空且不需要的元素,该函数将不输出标签('')。对于有空#title的必填元素,该函数将在标签中单独输出必填标记。标签将使用#id将标记与必填字段关联起来。这对于屏幕阅读器用户知道哪个字段是必填的尤为重要。

trans-unit.source: This function will purge deleted field data in batches. The batch size is defined as an argument to the function, and once each batch is finished, it continues with the next batch until all have completed. If a deleted field with no remaining data records is found, the field itself will be purged. If a deleted field storage with no remaining fields is found, the field storage itself will be purged.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将分批清除已删除的字段数据。批次大小被定义为函数的一个参数,一旦每个批次完成,它将继续下一个批次,直到所有批次完成。如果发现一个被删除的字段没有剩余的数据记录,则字段本身将被清除。如果发现一个被删除的字段存储空间没有剩余的字段,则字段存储空间本身将被清除。

trans-unit.source: This function will return tasks regardless of whether or not they are intended to run on the current page request. However, the list can change based on the installation state (for example, if an installation profile hasn't been selected yet, we don't yet know which profile tasks will be available).
trans-unit.target: 该函数将返回任务,无论它们是否打算在当前页面请求上运行。然而,列表可以根据安装状态而改变(例如,如果还没有选择安装配置文件,我们还不知道哪些配置文件任务可用)。

trans-unit.source: This function will start a batch to import translations for the added components.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将启动一个批次来导入新增组件的翻译。

trans-unit.source: This function will use the file_chmod_directory and file_chmod_file settings for the default modes for directories and uploaded/generated files. By default these will give everyone read access so that users accessing the files with a user account without the webserver group (e.g. via FTP) can read these files, and give group write permissions so webserver group members (e.g. a vhost account) can alter files uploaded and owned by the webserver.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将使用file_chmod_directory和file_chmod_file设置为目录和上传/生成文件的默认模式。默认情况下,这些设置会给每个人以读的权限,这样用户在没有webserver组的情况下,使用用户账户访问文件(例如通过FTP)可以读取这些文件,并给组的写权限,这样webserver组成员(例如vhost账户)可以修改webserver上传和拥有的文件。

trans-unit.source: This generates default constraint definitions based on the data definition; for example, a NotNull constraint is generated if the data is defined as required. Besides that, any constraints defined for the data type (that is, below the 'constraint' key of the type's plugin definition) are taken into account.
trans-unit.target: 这将根据数据定义生成默认的约束定义;例如,如果数据被定义为必填,就会生成NotNull约束。除此之外,任何为数据类型定义的约束条件(即在该类型插件定义的 "约束 "键下面)都会被考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: This handler is run when JavaScript is disabled. It triggers the form to rebuild so that the "Parent item" options are changed to reflect the newly selected book. When JavaScript is enabled, the submit button that triggers this handler is hidden, and the "Book" dropdown directly triggers the book_form_update() Ajax callback instead.
trans-unit.target: 禁用JavaScript时运行此处理程序。它会触发重新生成表单，以便更改“父项”选项以反映新选择的书。启用JavaScript后，将隐藏触发此处理程序的提交按钮，而“ Book”下拉列表将直接触发book_form_update（）Ajax回调。

trans-unit.source: This handler will catch any exceptions not caught elsewhere and report them as an error page.
trans-unit.target: 该处理程序将捕获任何其他地方没有捕获的异常,并将其报告为错误页面。

trans-unit.source: This has full revision support. For entities requiring special queries, the class can be extended, and the default query can be constructed by calling parent::buildQuery(). This is usually necessary when the object being loaded needs to be augmented with additional data from another table, such as loading node type into comments or vocabulary machine name into terms, however it can also support $conditions on different tables. See Drupal\comment\CommentStorage::buildQuery() for an example.
trans-unit.target: 它具有完整的修订支持。对于需要特殊查询的实体，可以扩展该类，并可以通过调用parent :: buildQuery（）构造默认查询。当需要使用来自另一个表的其他数据来扩充正在加载的对象时，例如，将节点类型加载到注释中或将词汇机名称加载到术语中时，这通常是必需的，但是它也可以支持不同表上的$ condition。有关示例，请参见Drupal \ comment \ CommentStorage :: buildQuery（）。

trans-unit.source: This hash is normally used to build a unique and secure URL that is sent to the user by email for purposes such as resetting the user's password. In order to validate the URL, the same hash can be generated again, from the same information, and compared to the hash value from the URL. The hash contains the time stamp, the user's last login time, the numeric user ID, and the user's email address. For a usage example, see user_cancel_url() and \Drupal\user\Controller\UserController::confirmCancel().
trans-unit.target: 此哈希通常用于构建唯一且安全的URL，该URL通过电子邮件发送给用户，用于诸如重置用户密码之类的目的。为了验证URL，可以根据相同的信息再次生成相同的哈希，并将其与URL中的哈希值进行比较。哈希包含时间戳，用户的上次登录时间，数字用户ID和用户的电子邮件地址。有关用法示例，请参见user_cancel_url（）和\ Drupal \ user \ Controller \ UserController :: confirmCancel（）。

trans-unit.source: This helper function should be used when the depth of the array element being retrieved may vary (that is, the number of parent keys is variable). It is primarily used for form structures and renderable arrays.
trans-unit.target: 当被检索的数组元素的深度可能变化时(即父键的数量是可变的),应该使用这个辅助函数。它主要用于表单结构和可渲染的数组。

trans-unit.source: This helper function should be used when the depth of the array element to be checked may vary (that is, the number of parent keys is variable). See NestedArray::setValue() for details. It is primarily used for form structures and renderable arrays.
trans-unit.target: 当要检查的数组元素的深度可能变化时（即，父键的数量是可变的），应使用此辅助函数。有关详细信息，请参见NestedArray :: setValue（）。它主要用于表单结构和可渲染数组。

trans-unit.source: This helper function should be used when the depth of the array element you are changing may vary (that is, the number of parent keys is variable). It is primarily used for form structures and renderable arrays.
trans-unit.target: 当你要改变的数组元素的深度可能会变化时(即父键的数量是可变的),应该使用这个辅助函数。它主要用于表单结构和可渲染的数组。

trans-unit.source: This helper method returns a stream instance using a scheme. That is, the passed string does not contain a "://". For example, "public" is a scheme but "public://" is a URI (stream). This is because the later contains both a scheme and target despite target being empty.
trans-unit.target: 这个助手方法使用方案返回一个流实例。也就是说,传递的字符串不包含"://"。例如,"public "是一个方案,但 "public://"是一个URI(流)。这是因为尽管target是空的,但后者同时包含了scheme和target。

trans-unit.source: This helps reduce ambiguity for user-entered links and paths, and supports user interfaces where users may normally use auto-completion to search for existing resources, but also may type one of these characters to link to (e.g.) a specific path on the site. (With regard to the URI specification, the user input is treated as a relative URI reference where the relative part is of type path-abempty.)
trans-unit.target: 这有助于减少用户输入的链接和路径的歧义，并支持用户界面，用户通常可以使用自动完成功能来搜索现有资源，也可以键入以下字符之一来链接至（例如）网站上的特定路径。（关于URI规范，用户输入被视为相对URI引用，其中相对部分的类型为path-abempty。）

trans-unit.source: This hook allows any module or theme to provide alternative theme function or template name suggestions and reorder or remove suggestions provided by hook_theme_suggestions_HOOK() or by earlier invocations of this hook.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩允许任何模块或主题提供替代的主题功能或模板名称建议，并重新排序或删除由hook_theme_suggestions_HOOK（）或此挂钩的较早调用提供的建议。

trans-unit.source: This hook allows modules to define default shortcut sets for a particular user that differ from the site-wide default (for example, a module may want to define default shortcuts on a per-role basis).
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子允许模块为特定用户定义不同于全站默认的默认快捷方式集(例如,模块可能希望在每个角色的基础上定义默认快捷方式)。

trans-unit.source: This hook allows modules to enforce permissions on file downloads whenever Drupal is handling file download, as opposed to the web server bypassing Drupal and returning the file from a public directory. Modules can also provide headers to specify information like the file's name or MIME type.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子允许模块在Drupal处理文件下载时强制执行文件下载权限,而不是web服务器绕过Drupal从公共目录返回文件。模块也可以提供头文件来指定文件的名称或MIME类型等信息。

trans-unit.source: This hook allows modules to preprocess theme variables for a specific theme hook. It should only be used if a module needs to override or add to the theme preprocessing for a theme hook it didn't define.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子允许模块为一个特定的主题钩子预处理主题变量。它只应该在模块需要覆盖或添加到它没有定义的主题钩子的主题预处理时使用。

trans-unit.source: This hook allows modules to preprocess theme variables for theme templates. It is called for all theme hooks implemented as templates, but not for theme hooks implemented as functions. hook_preprocess_HOOK() can be used to preprocess variables for a specific theme hook, whether implemented as a template or function.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩允许模块预处理主题模板的主题变量。对于实现为模板的所有主题挂钩都需要调用它，但对于实现为函数的主题挂钩则不要求使用它。hook_preprocess_HOOK（）可用于预处理特定主题挂钩的变量，无论是作为模板还是函数实现。

trans-unit.source: This hook allows modules to provide alternative theme function or template name suggestions.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子允许模块提供替代的主题功能或模板名称建议。

trans-unit.source: This hook allows your module to rebuild its data based on the latest/current module data. It runs after hook_cache_flush() and after all module data has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩可让您的模块根据最新/当前的模块数据重建其数据。它在hook_cache_flush（）之后和所有模块数据已更新之后运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook asks your module to clear all of its static caches, in order to ensure a clean environment for subsequently invoked data rebuilds.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子要求您的模块清除所有的静态缓存,以确保后续调用的数据重建有一个干净的环境。

trans-unit.source: This hook augments MODULE.config_translation.yml as well as THEME.config_translation.yml files to collect dynamic translation mapper information. If your information is static, just provide such a YAML file with your module containing the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子增强了MODULE.config_translation.yml以及THEME.config_translation.yml文件来收集动态翻译映射信息。如果你的信息是静态的,只需在你的模块中提供这样一个包含映射的YAML文件。

trans-unit.source: This hook can notably be used to change the label of the empty option.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子可以显著地用来改变空选项的标签。

trans-unit.source: This hook enables modules to take effect when a style is being flushed (all images are being deleted from the server and regenerated). Any module-specific caches that contain information related to the style should be cleared using this hook. This hook is called whenever a style is updated, deleted, or any effect associated with the style is update or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子可以让模块在样式被刷新时生效(所有图片都从服务器上删除并重新生成)。任何包含风格相关信息的模块特定缓存都应该使用这个钩子来清除。每当一个样式被更新、删除,或者任何与该样式相关的效果被更新或删除时,这个钩子都会被调用。

trans-unit.source: This hook has three closely related uses, determined by the $phase argument:
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子有三个密切相关的用途,由$phase参数决定。

trans-unit.source: This hook is NOT invoked for the 'user_cancel_delete' account cancellation method. To react to that method, implement hook_ENTITY_TYPE_predelete() or hook_ENTITY_TYPE_delete() for user entities instead.
trans-unit.target: 'user_cancel_delete'帐户取消方法不会调用此挂钩。要对该方法做出反应，请改为为用户实体实现hook_ENTITY_TYPE_predelete（）或hook_ENTITY_TYPE_delete（）。

trans-unit.source: This hook is called after the content has been assembled in a structured array and may be used for doing processing which requires that the complete block content structure has been built.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在内容被组装到结构化数组中后被调用,可以用于做需要建立完整的块内容结构的处理。

trans-unit.source: This hook is called after the content has been assembled in a structured array and may be used for doing processing which requires that the complete entity content structure has been built.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在内容被组装到结构化数组后被调用,可以用于做需要建立完整实体内容结构的处理。

trans-unit.source: This hook is called after the in-place editor plugins have been discovered, but before they are cached. Hence any alterations will be cached.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在原地编辑插件被发现后,但在它们被缓存之前被调用。因此,任何改动都会被缓存。

trans-unit.source: This hook is called from file_create_url(), and is called fairly frequently (10+ times per page), depending on how many files there are in a given page. If CSS and JS aggregation are disabled, this can become very frequently (50+ times per page) so performance is critical.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩是从file_create_url（）中调用的，并且被相当频繁地调用（每页10次以上），具体取决于给定页面中有多少个文件。如果禁用CSS和JS聚合，这可能会变得非常频繁（每页50次以上），因此性能至关重要。

trans-unit.source: This hook is called from MailManagerInterface->mail(). Note that hook_mail(), unlike hook_mail_alter(), is only called on the $module argument to MailManagerInterface->mail(), not all modules.
trans-unit.target: 从MailManagerInterface-> mail（）调用此挂钩。需要注意的是hook_mail（），不像hook_mail_alter（），只呼吁$模块参数MailManagerInterface->电子邮件（），不是所有的模块。

trans-unit.source: This hook is called to preprocess both the text added to the search index and the keywords users have submitted for searching. The same processing needs to be applied to both so that searches will find matches.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子被调用来预处理添加到搜索索引中的文本和用户提交的搜索关键词。需要对两者进行相同的处理,这样搜索才能找到匹配的词。

trans-unit.source: This hook is for implementation by node access modules. In this hook, the module grants a user different "grant IDs" within one or more "realms". In hook_node_access_records(), the realms and grant IDs are associated with permission to view, edit, and delete individual nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩是由节点访问模块实现的。在此挂钩中，模块在一个或多个“领域”内向用户授予不同的“授予ID”。在hook_node_access_records（）中，领域和授权ID与查看，编辑和删除单个节点的权限相关联。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked after the operation has been performed.
trans-unit.target: 该钩子在操作完成后被调用。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked by drupal_flush_all_caches(). It runs before module data is updated and before hook_rebuild().
trans-unit.target: 该钩子由drupal_flush_all_caches（）调用。它在模块数据更新之前和hook_rebuild（）之前运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked by menu_local_tasks(). The system-determined tabs and actions are passed in by reference. Additional tabs may be added.
trans-unit.target: 该钩子由menu_local_tasks（）调用。系统确定的选项卡和操作通过引用传递。可能会添加其他选项卡。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked by \Drupal\Core\Menu\ContextualLinkManager::getContextualLinkPluginsByGroup(). The system-determined contextual links are passed in by reference. Additional links may be added and existing links can be altered.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩由\ Drupal \ Core \ Menu \ ContextualLinkManager :: getContextualLinkPluginsByGroup（）调用。系统确定的上下文链接通过引用传递。可以添加其他链接，并且可以更改现有链接。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked by contextual_pre_render_links(). The renderable array of #type 'contextual_links', containing the entire contextual links data that is passed in by reference. Further links may be added or existing links can be altered.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子由contextual_pre_render_links()调用。可渲染的#类型为'contextual_links'的数组,包含了通过引用传入的全部上下文链接数据。可以添加更多的链接,也可以修改现有的链接。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked by toolbar_view() immediately after hook_toolbar(). The toolbar definitions are passed in by reference. Each element of the $items array is one item returned by a module from hook_toolbar(). Additional items may be added, or existing items altered.
trans-unit.target: 在hook_toolbar（）之后，toolbar_view（）会立即调用此钩子。工具栏定义通过引用传递。$ items数组的每个元素都是模块从hook_toolbar（）返回的一项。可以添加其他项目，或更改现有项目。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked during \Drupal::moduleHandler()->getImplementations(). A module may implement this hook in order to reorder the implementing modules, which are otherwise ordered by the module's system weight.
trans-unit.target: 在\ Drupal :: moduleHandler（）-> getImplementations（）期间调用此钩子。模块可以实现此挂钩，以便对实现模块进行重新排序，否则，将按模块的系统权重对其进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked during search indexing, after loading, and after the result of rendering is added as $node->rendered to the node object.
trans-unit.target: 在加载后以及将渲染结果作为$ node-> render添加到节点对象之后，将在搜索索引期间调用此挂钩。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked for all theme hooks, if you are targeting a specific theme hook it's best to use hook_theme_suggestions_HOOK_alter().
trans-unit.target: 所有主题挂钩都将调用此挂钩，如果您要定位特定主题挂钩，则最好使用hook_theme_suggestions_HOOK_alter（）。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked from \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityAccessControlHandler::fieldAccess() to let modules grant or deny operations on fields.
trans-unit.target: 从\ Drupal \ Core \ Entity \ EntityAccessControlHandler :: fieldAccess（）调用此挂钩，以允许模块授予或拒绝对字段的操作。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked from user_cancel() before a user account is canceled. Depending on the account cancellation method, the module should either do nothing, unpublish content, or anonymize content. See user_cancel_methods() for the list of default account cancellation methods provided by User module. Modules may add further methods via hook_user_cancel_methods_alter().
trans-unit.target: 在取消用户帐户之前，将从user_cancel（）调用此挂钩。根据帐户取消方法，模块应该不执行任何操作，取消发布内容或匿名化内容。有关用户模块提供的默认帐户取消方法的列表，请参见user_cancel_methods（）。模块可以通过hook_user_cancel_methods_alter（）添加更多方法。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked from the node search plugin during search execution, after loading and rendering the node.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子是在搜索执行过程中,加载和渲染节点后,从节点搜索插件中调用的。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked in _system_rebuild_module_data() and in \Drupal\Core\Extension\ThemeHandlerInterface::rebuildThemeData(). A module may implement this hook in order to add to or alter the data generated by reading the .info.yml file with \Drupal\Core\Extension\InfoParser.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩在_system_rebuild_module_data（）和\ Drupal \ Core \ Extension \ ThemeHandlerInterface :: rebuildThemeData（）中调用。模块可以实现此挂钩，以便添加或更改通过使用\ Drupal \ Core \ Extension \ InfoParser读取.info.yml文件而生成的数据。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked in toolbar_pre_render().
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在toolbar_pre_render()中被调用。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked on the install profile in install_tasks().
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩在install_tasks（）中的安装配置文件上调用。

trans-unit.source: This hook is invoked when someone calls \Drupal\Core\Utility\Token::replace(). That function first scans the text for [type:token] patterns, and splits the needed tokens into groups by type. Then hook_tokens() is invoked on each token-type group, allowing your module to respond by providing replacement text for any of the tokens in the group that your module knows how to process.
trans-unit.target: 当有人调用\ Drupal \ Core \ Utility \ Token :: replace（）时，将调用此挂钩。该函数首先扫描文本以查找[type：token]模式，然后按类型将所需的令牌划分为多个组。然后，在每个令牌类型组上调用hook_tokens（），从而允许您的模块通过提供模块中知道如何处理的组中任何令牌的替换文本进行响应。

trans-unit.source: This hook is only invoked after the system has been completely cleared; i.e., all previously cached data is known to be gone and every API in the system is known to return current information, so your module can safely rely on all available data to rebuild its own.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子只有在系统完全清空之后才会被调用;也就是说,所有之前缓存的数据都已知消失了,系统中的每一个API都已知会返回当前的信息,所以你的模块可以安全地依靠所有可用的数据来重建自己的模块。

trans-unit.source: This hook is used in a theme engine implementation in the format of ENGINE_extension().
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在主题引擎实现中使用,格式为ENGINE_extension()。

trans-unit.source: This hook is useful to extend existing configuration mappers with new configuration names, for example when altering existing forms with new settings stored elsewhere. This allows the translation experience to also reflect the compound form element in one screen.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子对于用新的配置名称扩展现有的配置映射器是很有用的,例如,当用存储在其他地方的新设置改变现有表单时。这使得翻译体验也能在一个屏幕中反映复合表单元素。

trans-unit.source: This hook lets modules perform additional validation on files. They're able to report a failure by returning one or more error messages.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子让模块可以对文件进行额外的验证。它们能够通过返回一个或多个错误信息来报告失败。

trans-unit.source: This hook may be used to modify handler properties after they have been specified by other modules.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子可以用来在其他模块指定了处理程序的属性之后修改它们。

trans-unit.source: This hook may be used to modify plugin properties after they have been specified by other modules.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子可以用来修改其他模块指定的插件属性。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs after a new entity object has just been instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在刚刚实例化一个新的实体对象后运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs after a new entity object or a new entity translation object has just been instantiated. It can be used to set initial values, e.g. to provide defaults.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在刚刚实例化一个新的实体对象或新的实体翻译对象后运行。它可以用来设置初始值,例如提供默认值。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs after a new entity translation object has just been instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子在刚刚实例化一个新的实体翻译对象后运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs once the entity has been deleted from the storage.
trans-unit.target: 一旦实体从存储中被删除,这个钩子就会运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs once the entity has been stored. Note that hook implementations may not alter the stored entity data.
trans-unit.target: 一旦实体被存储,这个钩子就会运行。请注意,钩子的实现不能改变存储的实体数据。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs once the entity revision has been deleted from the storage.
trans-unit.target: 一旦实体修订版从存储中被删除,这个钩子就会运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs once the entity storage has been updated. Note that hook implementations may not alter the stored entity data. Get the original entity object from $entity->original.
trans-unit.target: 一旦实体存储已更新，该挂钩就会运行。请注意，挂钩实现可能不会更改存储的实体数据。从$ entity-> original获取原始实体对象。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs once the entity translation has been deleted from storage.
trans-unit.target: 一旦实体翻译被从存储中删除,该钩子就会运行。

trans-unit.source: This hook runs once the entity translation has been stored. Note that hook implementations may not alter the stored entity translation data.
trans-unit.target: 一旦实体翻译被存储,该钩子就会运行。请注意,钩子的实现不能改变存储的实体翻译数据。

trans-unit.source: This hook should be implemented in a .module file, not in an .install file.
trans-unit.target: 这个钩子应该在.模块文件中实现,而不是在.安装文件中。

trans-unit.source: This hook will fire whenever a view is enabled, disabled, created, updated, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 每当启用、禁用、创建、更新或删除一个视图时,这个钩子就会触发。

trans-unit.source: This implementation caches all active trail IDs per route match for *all* menus whose active trails are calculated on that page. This ensures 1 cache get for all active trails per page load, rather than N.
trans-unit.target: 该实现对该页面上计算出的所有*个菜单的活动路径ID进行缓存。这确保了每次页面加载时,所有活动路径的缓存获取次数为1次,而不是N次。

trans-unit.source: This implementation caches all active trail IDs per route match for *all* menus whose active trails are calculated on that page. This ensures 1 cache get for all active trails per page load, rather than N. Overrides MenuActiveTrailInterface::getActiveTrailIds
trans-unit.target: 此实现为* all *菜单（其活动路径在该页面上计算）的每个路由匹配项缓存所有活动路径ID。这样可以确保每个页面加载的所有活动路径获得1个缓存，而不是N。覆盖MenuActiveTrailInterface :: getActiveTrailIds

trans-unit.source: This implementation won't actually lock anything and will always succeed on lock attempts.
trans-unit.target: 这个实现实际上不会锁定任何东西,并且在锁定尝试上总是会成功。

trans-unit.source: This implementation:
trans-unit.target: 这一实施。

trans-unit.source: This includes field definitions, base field definitions, and field storage definitions.
trans-unit.target: 这包括字段定义、基本字段定义和字段存储定义。

trans-unit.source: This information can only be provided after it was added with addField().
trans-unit.target: 这些信息只有在使用addField()添加后才能提供。

trans-unit.source: This information is exposed to all database drivers, although it is only useful on some of them. This method is table prefix-aware.
trans-unit.target: 这些信息会暴露给所有的数据库驱动程序,尽管它只对其中的一些驱动程序有用。这种方法是表前缀识别的。

trans-unit.source: This instructs the client to attach the name=value pair of data to the selector via jQuery's data cache.
trans-unit.target: 这指示客户端通过jQuery的数据缓存将name=value这对数据附加到选择器上。

trans-unit.source: This interface allows both configurable fields and overridden base fields to share a common interface. The interface also extends ConfigEntityInterface to ensure that implementations have the expected save() method.
trans-unit.target: 该接口允许可配置字段和重写基字段共享一个通用接口。该接口还扩展了ConfigEntityInterface,以确保实现具有预期的save()方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface also provides methods to retrieve instances of the definitions to be updated ready to be manipulated. In fact when definitions change in code the system needs to be notified about that and the definitions stored in state need to be reconciled with the ones living in code. This typically happens in Update API functions, which need to take the system from a known state to another known state. Relying on the definitions living in code might prevent this, as the system might transition directly to the last available state, and thus skipping the intermediate steps. Manipulating the definitions in state allows to avoid this and ensures that the various steps of the update process are predictable and repeatable.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口还提供了检索要更新的定义实例的方法,以便随时进行操作。实际上当代码中的定义发生变化时,系统需要得到相关通知,存储在状态中的定义需要与活在代码中的定义进行核对,这通常发生在Update API函数中,它需要将系统从已知状态带到另一个已知状态。这通常发生在Update API函数中,它需要把系统从一个已知状态带到另一个已知状态。依靠生活在代码中的定义可能会阻止这一点,因为系统可能会直接过渡到最后一个可用的状态,从而跳过中间的步骤。操纵状态中的定义可以避免这种情况,并确保更新过程的各个步骤是可预测和可重复的。

trans-unit.source: This interface builds upon the general interfaces provided by the typed data API, while extending them with entity-specific additions. I.e., fieldable entities implement the ComplexDataInterface among others, thus it is complex data containing fields as its data properties. The contained fields have to implement \Drupal\Core\Field\FieldItemListInterface, which builds upon typed data interfaces as well.
trans-unit.target: 此接口建立在类型数据API提供的常规接口的基础上，同时通过特定于实体的添加来扩展它们。即，可现场设置的实体除其他外实现了ComplexDataInterface，因此它是包含字段作为其数据属性的复杂数据。包含的字段必须实现\ Drupal \ Core \ Field \ FieldItemListInterface，它也基于键入的数据接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface can be implemented by entity handlers that require dependency injection.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口可以由需要依赖注入的实体处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: This interface defines the full behavior of the central Drupal logger facility. However, when writing code that does logging, use the generic \Psr\Log\LoggerInterface for typehinting instead (you shouldn't need the methods here).
trans-unit.target: 该接口定义了中央Drupal记录器功能的完整行为。但是，在编写执行日志记录的代码时，请改用通用\ Psr \ Log \ LoggerInterface进行类型提示（此处不需要此方法）。

trans-unit.source: This interface details base wrapping methods that most widget implementations will want to directly inherit from Drupal\Core\Field\WidgetBase. See Drupal\Core\Field\WidgetInterface for methods that will more likely be overridden in actual widget implementations.
trans-unit.target: 该接口详细介绍了大多数小部件实现都希望直接从Drupal \ Core \ Field \ WidgetBase继承的基本包装方法。请参阅Drupal \ Core \ Field \ WidgetInterface，以了解在实际的小部件实现中更有可能被覆盖的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface details the methods that most plugin implementations will want to override. See Drupal\Core\Field\WidgetBaseInterface for base wrapping methods that should most likely be inherited directly from Drupal\Core\Field\WidgetBase..
trans-unit.target: 该接口详细介绍了大多数插件实现将要覆盖的方法。有关最可能直接从Drupal \ Core \ Field \ WidgetBase继承的基本包装方法，请参见Drupal \ Core \ Field \ WidgetBaseInterface。

trans-unit.source: This interface extends Symfony's KernelInterface and adds methods for responding to modules being enabled or disabled during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口扩展了Symfony的KernelInterface,并增加了在模块启用或禁用时的响应方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface gives classes who need services a factory method for instantiation rather than defining a new service.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口给需要服务的类提供了一个工厂方法进行实例化,而不是定义一个新的服务。

trans-unit.source: This interface is present on a data definition if it describes a list. The actual lists implement the \Drupal\Core\TypedData\ListInterface.
trans-unit.target: 如果该接口描述列表，则该接口存在于数据定义中。实际的列表实现\ Drupal \ Core \ TypedData \ ListInterface。

trans-unit.source: This interface must be implemented by every entity field, whereas contained field items must implement the FieldItemInterface. Some methods of the fields are delegated to the first contained item, in particular get() and set() as well as their magic equivalences.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口必须由每个实体字段实现,而包含的字段项必须实现FieldItemInterface。字段的一些方法被委托给第一个包含的项目,特别是get()和set()以及它们的魔力等价物。

trans-unit.source: This involves the same hooks and operations as regular entity loading.
trans-unit.target: 这涉及到与常规实体加载相同的钩子和操作。

trans-unit.source: This is Drupal's default cache implementation. It uses the database to store cached data. Each cache bin corresponds to a database table by the same name.
trans-unit.target: 这是Drupal的默认缓存实现。它使用数据库来存储缓存的数据。每个缓存仓对应一个同名的数据库表。

trans-unit.source: This is Drupal's default key/value store implementation. It uses the database to store key/value data.
trans-unit.target: 这是Drupal默认的键/值存储实现。它使用数据库来存储键/值数据。

trans-unit.source: This is a PHP implementation of the drupal.active-link JavaScript library.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个PHP实现的drupal.active-link JavaScript库。

trans-unit.source: This is a cooperative, advisory lock system. Any long-running operation that could potentially be attempted in parallel by multiple requests should try to acquire a lock before proceeding. By obtaining a lock, one request notifies any other requests that a specific operation is in progress which must not be executed in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个合作的、顾问式的锁系统。任何可能被多个请求并行尝试的长期运行的操作,都应该在继续之前尝试获得一个锁。通过获得一个锁,一个请求通知其他任何请求,一个特定的操作正在进行中,不得并行执行。

trans-unit.source: This is a factory method that returns a new instance of this class. The factory should pass any needed dependencies into the constructor of this class, but not the container itself. Every call to this method must return a new instance of this class; that is, it may not implement a singleton.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个工厂方法,它返回这个类的新实例。工厂应该将任何所需的依赖关系传递给这个类的构造函数,但不是容器本身。对这个方法的每次调用都必须返回这个类的新实例;也就是说,它不能实现单人。

trans-unit.source: This is a factory method that returns a new instance of this object. The factory should pass any needed dependencies into the constructor of this object, but not the container itself. Every call to this method must return a new instance of this object; that is, it may not implement a singleton.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个工厂方法,它返回这个对象的新实例。工厂应该将任何所需的依赖关系传递给这个对象的构造函数,但不是容器本身。对这个方法的每次调用都必须返回这个对象的新实例;也就是说,它不能实现单人。

trans-unit.source: This is a generic load hook called for all entity types loaded via the entity API.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个通用的加载钩子,通过实体API加载所有实体类型。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper function that calls buildExternalUrl() or buildLocalUrl() based on a check of whether the path is a valid external URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个辅助函数,它调用buildExternalUrl()或buildLocalUrl(),基于对路径是否为有效外部URL的检查。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper function that calls buildExternalUrl() or buildLocalUrl() based on a check of whether the path is a valid external URL. Overrides UnroutedUrlAssemblerInterface::assemble
trans-unit.target: 这是一个帮助函数，它基于对路径是否为有效外部URL的检查来调用buildExternalUrl（）或buildLocalUrl（）。覆盖UnroutedUrlAssemblerInterface :: assemble

trans-unit.source: This is a high performance way to provide a handful of string replacements.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种高性能的方式,可以提供少量的字符串替换。

trans-unit.source: This is a high performance way to provide a handful of string replacements. See settings.php for examples.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个提供少量字符串替换的高性能方法。请看settings.php的例子.

trans-unit.source: This is a kill switch — both orIf() and andIf() will result in isForbidden() if either results are isForbidden().
trans-unit.target: 这是一个kill开关—如果两个结果均为isForbidden（），则orIf（）和andIf（）都将导致isForbidden（）。

trans-unit.source: This is a multistep operation: we go through all nodes by packs of 20. The batch processing engine interrupts processing and sends progress feedback after 1 second execution time.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个多步骤的操作:我们按20个包的方式去处理所有节点。批处理引擎在执行时间1秒后中断处理并发送进度反馈。

trans-unit.source: This is a nested array whose top-level keys are 'app' and 'site', denoting the origin of a service provider. Site-specific providers have to be collected separately, because they need to be processed last, so as to be able to override services from application service providers.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个嵌套数组,其顶层键是 "app "和 "site",表示服务提供者的来源。站点特定的提供商必须单独收集,因为它们需要最后处理,以便能够覆盖应用程序服务提供商的服务。

trans-unit.source: This is a powerful function that in many ways performs like an advanced version of copy().
trans-unit.target: 这是一个功能强大的功能，在许多方面都可以像copy（）的高级版本一样执行。

trans-unit.source: This is a powerful function that in many ways performs like an advanced version of rename().
trans-unit.target: 这是一个功能强大的功能，在很多方面都可以像rename（）的高级版本一样执行。

trans-unit.source: This is a publicly accessible static method to allow for alternative usages in data conversion scripts and also tests.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个可公开访问的静态方法,允许在数据转换脚本和测试中进行替代使用。

trans-unit.source: This is a ridiculously long set of constructor parameters, but as this object is little more than a collection of values it's not a serious problem. The parent Symfony class does the same, as well, making it difficult to override differently.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组长得离谱的构造函数参数,但由于这个对象只不过是一个值的集合,所以这不是一个严重的问题。父类Symfony类也是这样做的,因此很难用不同的方式来覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This is a setting name that will be used if the specific setting does not exist. The setting value will be the id of a service.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个设置名称,如果特定的设置不存在,则将使用该名称。设置值将是服务的id。

trans-unit.source: This is a special case of \Drupal\Core\Render\Element\Dropbutton; the only difference is that it offers themes the possibility to render it differently through a theme suggestion.
